autoOpenBtnTooltip: Sets the overlay to open up automatically when you launch the application.
autoOpenVRBtnTooltip: The VR feature will automatically activate when you join to a session in the game, and it will stop itself when you leave a game.
lockOverlayTooltip: Lock overlay in position. You can also click through the window when it's locked.

notifications.createOverlayContent: {{overlayName}} has been opened. Make sure you join to a game session to see
notifications.resetOverlayPositionContent: {{overlayName}} position was reset to it's default
notifications.resetOverlaySettingsContent: {{overlayName}} settings has been reset to it's default settings
notifications.toggleAutoOpenOffContent: This overlay will not open up automatically anymore
notifications.toggleAutoOpenOnContent: This overlay will automatically open up when you open RaceLab
notifications.toggleAutoOpenVROffContent: The VR feature will not start automatically anymore
notifications.toggleAutoOpenVROnContent: This VR feature will automatically start when you join to a session in your game
notifications.toggleLockOverlayOffContent: All overlays has been unlocked on your screen. Now you can move them around
notifications.toggleLockOverlayOnContent: All overlays has been locked on your screen. Now you can also click through them
notifications.toggleVRModeOffContent: VR mode has been turned off
notifications.toggleVRModeOnContent: VR mode has been enabled. It might take few seconds to show up in your headset

proFeatureSubText: Upgrade to a Pro Membership to use this overlay and support RaceLab
qrToogleBtnTooltip: Generates a QR code that you can use to load the overlay in other devices
vrToggleBtnTooltip: Enable/Disable VR mode. Enabling will automatically open overlays it in your VR
